summary: This is an email exchange from February 21, 2019, discussing the trial status of an unspecified case. The sender mentions possibly sending a draft related to Epstein as a distraction and references Judge Sweet reading the charge to a jury. The email signature identifies an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Judge Sweet
persons.context: Mentioned as having just finished reading the charge to the jury in an unspecified trial.

events.title: Trial charge reading
events.description: Judge Sweet finished reading the charge to the jury in an unspecified trial.

keyFacts: The email exchange occurred on February 21, 2019, discussing an ongoing trial.
The sender references possibly sending a 'draft Epstein thing' to the recipient as a distraction.
The email signature identifies the sender as an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
Judge Sweet is mentioned as having just read the charge to the jury.
